entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Schefferville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:25 AM EST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Partly Cloudy, -14.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Schefferville Airport 10:00 AM EST Sunday 05 March 2023
Condition: Partly Cloudy
Temperature: -14.0°C

Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 71 %

Dewpoint: -18.2°C

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning this morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 30 this morning and minus 18 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow. Amount 15 cm. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 13. Wind chill near minus 25. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 05 March 2023
